title: AED Game Character Voice - Elf
description: Experience the allure of high-class immortality with The Elf, a character of pretentious elegance from a timeless realm. For evil or for good, this character is sure to add a touch of the magical and timeless to your game!
longDescription:
Audio Demo

Album Art by Dalton Webb


AED Game Character - Elf voice-over sound library provides you with more than 275+ immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files, vocalizations, custom character specific dialogue lines, stock non-player character dialogue lines, and everything needed to create compelling cinematic scenes, characters, and outstanding game-play audio experiences.Â 


The Elf voice profile is deep and rich with a hint of pretentiousness and sophistication. He is perfect for both heroes and villains and in-game non-player characters or any antagonist and protagonist game characters. His voice is ready for your game as is, provided in clean audio format in case you want to further process with vocals effects.


Features:


-Vocal Profile: Male, Baritone, Rich, Sophisticated, Educated,

- Perfect for NPC's in game and/or film based trailers.

-Featuring custom lines and NPC stock lines like: Kill them, I will destroy you, Attack. Perfect for MMO's, RPG's MOBA and RTS games.

-Featuring a variety of laughing, fighting, jumping and pain vocalizations to fully flesh out your next hero or villain in game!

-Works with any DAW or Game Engine

- Royalty Free and YouTube friendly

- Ready to rock, straight out of the box!
technicalDetails:
Features:

Male voice-over audio files

50 MB of voice samples

All in 44.1k/16 bit .wav file format


Number of Audio Waves: 291


Number of Audio Cues: 291


Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k/16bit


Do Sound FX loop: No


Windows: Yes


Mac: Yes
